Anchor.description: An anchor to render for replacment in Remix

name.description: The name of the anchor, used as a seed to create a random mesh so 2 anchors with the same name will have the same hash.

anim_type.description:
Which kind of animation the anchor will have
linear: moves from start to end and loops back to start
ping-pong: moves from start to end and then reverses to move back to start
static: does not move, will only rotate

start_loc.description: The starting location of the anchor

start_rot.description: The starting rotation of the anchor in degrees

rotation_rate.description: How much the anchor rotates in degrees per second

scale.description: What scale to apply to the anchor

end_loc.description: The destination location for the anchor to move to

speed.description: How fast the anchor will move from start to end in unreal units per second

anchors.description: A list of the anchors to create

config_vars.description: The RTX Remix config variables to apply when loading this level, the values should be in the same format as in rtx.conf

^[^$]+.*.description: An RTX Remix config key/value pair

description: A map of level names and the properties to apply when loading that level

_default_level.description: Properties used if the current level was not found in the level_properties file

^[^$]+.*.description: Properties used in the specified level
